page.title: 11Great Bromley: Leisure.
page.content: There are a small number of{clubs}in Gt. Bromley.The{Brownies}and{Guides} meet on Wednesday evenings but the {Cubs}and{Scouts}must travel to Ardleigh.The{Pantomime Group}meet to rehearse during the Winter.The{Bell} {Ringers}and the{Ladies Circle}also meet each week. In the village hall {Badminton}is played.For the older people there is the{Friends Circle. } Many people travel further afield for their activites.People go as far as Clacton,Manningtree and Colchester to the{Sports Centres.} The villagers are also very active at home.Gardening,knitting,Do It Yourself(home decorating),T.V.,cooking walking,dressmaking,and beer making are just some of the popular leisure activities.More unusual ones are{bee} {keeping,}and{pyrography,}which is burning decorative patterns on wood.
